oai_dc:dc.dc:title: THERMOLUMINESCENCE OF HEAVILY-DOPED NABRTL PHOSPHORS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SARWADE, JR
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The thermoluminescence characteristics of heavily doped NaBr:Tl phosphors with varying Tl content have been examined after their exposure to X-rays. The two glow peaks observed at 410 and 480 K seem to be dependent on the Tl concentration and the dose of the exciting radiation. The models for the Tl centres associated with these peaks are discussed.
